name: Lost in the prison-escape room
description:
Soul sci-fi first class room puzzle adventure game! Look forward to your attention!
Through the neon-lit streets of the windows, the city of reinforced jungle is bustling but quiet. It seems like there are countless eyes staring at me in all directions...!
Hearing me, I was locked up in this prison when I woke up. They said that I had killed people, but I didn't. I didn't do anything. Really, this is a fact. This place gives me a strange feeling. Every place is like once. But all people are weird and numb. . I'm scared.....!
--------------------------------
Game Features:
1: The first science fiction puzzle game
2: Cruel and cold game world
3: Still a pure hand-drawn game screen
